sentences:
" You Would n't Know Love " is a song written by Michael Bolton and Diane Warren appearing contemporaneously in 1989 on Bolton 's Soul Provider album and Cher 's Heart of Stone album .
The song was only released as a single in Europe and Australasia by Cher in 1990 .
Cher 's version of the song , produced by its writer , Michael Bolton , became the fourth and final European single release from Cher 's nineteenth album in 1990 by Geffen Records .
It was a minor hit in the UK , faring better in Ireland .
Cher 's album was certified 3× Platinum by the RIAA in 1998 for sales of over 3 million in the U.S. alone , with worldwide sales exceeding 11 million .
Steve Lukather played the guitar solo in the middle of the song .
